attributes.action: Ban the right for those in polygymous marriages to receive extra benefits for spouses
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The recent press reports that those in polygamous marriages will be able to claim benefits on behalf of their extra wives. We understand that these marriages take place outside the UK but we do not see it as our responsibility to provide a gravy train for them.
If you have multiple wives, you pay for their upkeep. Bigamy is illegal in the UK, why should we financially support those of a religion essentially out of our constitution.
